Class ButtonBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • problemdomain.ButtonBoard

  • public class ButtonBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle the gameboards created for the client gui

    Nic Kelly

        Parameters:
        shouldClick - should the button be able to click
        beforeClicked - the color the button is before it's clicked
        afterClicked - the color the button is after it's clicked
        gui - the reference to the parent gui
